titles.title: Stand up stand up for Jesus

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
G
Stand up stand up for Jesus
You soldiers of the cross
Lift high His royal banner
It must not suffer loss
From victory unto victory
His army He shall lead
Till evil is defeated
And Christ is Lord indeed

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Stand up stand up for Jesus
The trumpet-call obey
Then join the mighty conflict
In this His glorious day
Be strong in faith and serve Him
Against unnumbered foes
Let courage rise with danger
And strength to strength oppose

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Stand up stand up for Jesus
Stand in His power alone
For human might will fail you
You dare not trust your own
Put on the gospel armor
Keep watch with constant prayer
Where duty calls or danger
Be never failing there

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Stand up stand up for Jesus
The fight will not be long
This day the noise of battle
The next the victor's song
To everyone who conquers
A crown of life shall be
We with the King of glory
Shall reign eternally
